password-min-lowercase_one: Must contain at least {{count}} lowercase letter
password-min-lowercase_other: Must contain at least {{count}} lowercase letters
password-min-uppercase_one: Must contain at least {{count}} uppercase letter
password-min-uppercase_other: Must contain at least {{count}} uppercase letters
password-min-symbols_one: Must contain at least {{count}} special character
password-min-symbols_other: Must contain at least {{count}} special characters
phone: Must be a valid brazilian phone number
